/* eslint-disable jsx-a11y/anchor-is-valid */ /* eslint-disable react/jsx-no-target-blank */ import React from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; function Footer() { const scrollToTop = () => { window.scrollTo({ top: 0, behavior: "smooth", }); }; return (
